interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Vlasy Ponytail Extension Human Hair Black Brown Wrap Around Clip in Ponytail Hair Extensions Real Human Hair Long Straight Ponytail Hairpiece Easy Wearing 16 Inch Review Date: 2021/12/17 Store: Vlasy Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Vlasy', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '16 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '10.87 x 3.7 x 0.67 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} Review Text: I have very short hair and just cannot get it to grow past my shoulders, no matter what I do...
I see all these ladies walking around with these cute ponytails hanging, and it makes me so sad, I just wish I could put my hair into one. But it just won't grow long enough. While shopping around on Amazon, I found this clip in ponytail. And the fact that it's real human hair, and just a smidge off from my natural shade of color, I had to give it a try...I'm so glad I did. Now, I'm the one walking around with my head held high, and my "ponytail" swinging. I love it so much. I HAVE to give this 5 stars, how can I not? It's perfect for me, and if you too have the same problems with your natural hair as I do, you may be just as impressed with this product as I am. Review Title: Ponytail Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Natural Solution Himalayan Pink Salt Body Scrub with Organic Marula Essential Oil, Moisturizes and Nourishes Face & Skin - 12.3 Oz Natural Solution ['Natural Solution Organic Marula Oil Body Scrub Exfoliate and nourish your skin with this luxurious Natural Solution body scrub made with organic marula oil. Marula oil is a natural oil & is known for its ability to moisturize and protect the skin, as well as to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. This body scrub is also made with Himalayan pink salt, which is a natural exfoliator that helps to remove dead skin cells and leave your skin feeling smooth and soft. The scrub is gentle enough for daily use, and it is perfect for all skin types. Usage: Apply a generous amount of scrub to wet skin. Massage in circular motions for 2-3 minutes. Rinse with water. Use 2 times per week for best results. Caution: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately with water. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place. Benefits: 1- Exfoliates and removes dead skin cells 2- Moisturizes and nourishes the skin 3- Protects the skin from free radicals 4- Leaves skin feeling smooth and soft 5-Suitable for all skin types'] {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.75 x 3.75 x 3.6 inches; 12.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8246E', 'UPC': '818581019775', 'Manufacturer': 'Natural Solution'} Unfortunately, when I first used this, it caused a rash. I passed it on to a friend of mine, who seems to like it. Saying, "her skin feels so soft and smooth." Sharing with friends Daletu Nail Clips, 10PCS Clear Nail Clips Finger Extension Fixed Clip, Quick Building Finger Builder Nail Clamps, Nails Art DIY Manicure Tool Daletu {'Size': 'Large', 'Brand': 'Daletu', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Number of Pieces': '10', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '4.09 x 3.9 x 2.01 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '738634020063'} I use the polygel nails, and from time to time, I need to clip it on to hold it on until it gets completely dry. I got these clips to help aid in holding my nails in place. But for some reason, these clips leave dents in my nails. I had to redo them totally. 1 star is the lowest I can go. Dents in nails Luxsea 12 Colors Liquid Eyeliner Kit Matte and Glitter Colorful Cosmetic Pen Set Lasting Highly-Pigmented Extremely Fine Easy to Wear Waterproof Eye Liner Makeup Pen Set uxsea {'Brand': 'uxsea', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic,Glitter,Shimmer,Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Matte', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '6.97 x 5.51 x 0.55 inches; 0.71 Ounces'} The colors and very pretty. But when putting the liner on my eyes, I dipped the liner in the color, and went to apply it to my eye, but it's just not that great. It starts out going on smoothly, but its like it dries out mid stride across my lid. So other than the beautiful colors, I have nothing more good to say about these liquid eyeliners. Too Fast Drying Liner Waxing Kit,Wax Warmer Hair Removal for Women Men,upgrade Portable Wax Kit with Scented Hard Wax Beans,Wax Machine for sensitive skin Full Body at home waxing or on vacation JAPUSOON {'Item Form': 'Wax', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'JAPUSOON', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 7.4 x 5.2 inches; 1.41 Pounds', 'UPC': '750440491196'} It could warm the wax up a little quicker. As far as everything else goes, it's a great product. Now if only I could get the arch in my eyebrow down pat, lol. Hair be gone HANYUDIE Brown Wigs for Women Short Straight Wig with bangs Mixed Brown Bob Wig Shoulder Length Synthetic wig for Women Daily Party Use(16 inch) HANYUDIE {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'HANYUDIE', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '11.5 x 8.54 x 2.09 inches; 8.15 Ounces'} Well this is the second wig I have tried. One long hair, because I used to have long hair. That was a BIG NOPE! So I seen this one, It being the color of my natural hair, and shorter, I thought I would give it a try...Still a NOPE! Maybe I just cannot wear a wig...or maybe just not yet. I do still have hair. To me, it seems I'm about bald, but to others I've still got plenty of hair...I don't know, I'm just used to having hair, and I want hair, so I was trying this wig to rush along my need of something to give me hair, when I'm truly not ready for it yet. Because it's a nice wig, nice color, length and style, I rate this wig with 4 stars. It's not the wigs fault I'm not ready. Not for me Vlasy Ponytail Extension Human Hair Black Brown Wrap Around Clip in Ponytail Hair Extensions Real Human Hair Long Straight Ponytail Hairpiece Easy Wearing 16 Inch Vlasy {'Brand': 'Vlasy', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '16 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '10.87 x 3.7 x 0.67 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} I have very short hair and just cannot get it to grow past my shoulders, no matter what I do...
I see all these ladies walking around with these cute ponytails hanging, and it makes me so sad, I just wish I could put my hair into one. But it just won't grow long enough. While shopping around on Amazon, I found this clip in ponytail. And the fact that it's real human hair, and just a smidge off from my natural shade of color, I had to give it a try...I'm so glad I did. Now, I'm the one walking around with my head held high, and my "ponytail" swinging. I love it so much. I HAVE to give this 5 stars, how can I not? It's perfect for me, and if you too have the same problems with your natural hair as I do, you may be just as impressed with this product as I am. Ponytail
profile:
The user continues to exhibit a strong preference for natural and organic skincare products, seeking those with moisturizing and nourishing properties. Their focus on body scrubs with natural exfoliators indicates a desire for smooth skin, while past adverse reactions have fostered a cautious approach to new product selections. Previous disappointments in product performance have led to low ratings, particularly in their recent ventures into nail care and makeup, where they found issues with effectiveness and gentleness.

In their latest interaction, the user embraced a new beauty solution, positively rating a hair extension despite feeling initially unprepared for the change. This reflects their willingness to explore new options while prioritizing product effectiveness. They also expressed satisfaction with a waxing kit tailored for sensitive skin, although they seek improvements in wax warming efficiency.

Overall, the user's profile showcases a delicate balance between cautious exploration of new beauty items and a steadfast commitment to skincare and performance-focused products that align with their sensitivity concerns and personal needs. Their evolving interests suggest an open-mindedness towards diverse beauty solutions, yet they remain anchored in their crucial requirement for product effectiveness.
